## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-884">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-884">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-885">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-886">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-886">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-887">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-887">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-888">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-889">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-889">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-890">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-890">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-891">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-891">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-892">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-892">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-893">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-893">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-894">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-894">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-895">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-895">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-896">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-896">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-897">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-897">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-898">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-899">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-899">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-900">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-900">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-901">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-901">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-902">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-903">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-903">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-904">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-904">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-905">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-905">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-906">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-906">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-907">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-907">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-908">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-908">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-923">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-923">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-924">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-925">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-925">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-926">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-926">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-927">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-927">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-928">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-928">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-929">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-929">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-930">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-931">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-931">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-934">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-934">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-935">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-935">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-950">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-950">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-951">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-952">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-952">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-953">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-953">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-954">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-955">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-955">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-956">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-956">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-957">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-958">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-958">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-959">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-959">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-960">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-960">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-961">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-961">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-962">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-962">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-963">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-964">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-965">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-966">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-967">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-968">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-968">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-969">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-969">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-970">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-970">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-971">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-971">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-972">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-972">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-973">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-973">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-974">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-974">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-975">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-975">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-976">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-976">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-977">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-977">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-978">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-978">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-979">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-979">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-980">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-980">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-981">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-981">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-982">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-982">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-983">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-983">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-984">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-984">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-985">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-986">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-986">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-987">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-987">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-988">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-988">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-989">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-989">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-990">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-990">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-991">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-991">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-992">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-992">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-993">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-993">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-994">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-994">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-995">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-996">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-997">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-998">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-998">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-999">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-999">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1000">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1000">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1001">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1002">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1002">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1003">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1003">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1004">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1004">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1005">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1005">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1006">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1006">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1007">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1007">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1008">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1008">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1009">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1010">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1010">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1011">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1011">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1012">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1012">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1013">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1013">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1014">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1014">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1015">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1016">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1016">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1017">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1017">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1018">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1018">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1019">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1020">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1022">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1022">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1023">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1023">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1024">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1024">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1025">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1025">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1026">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1026">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1027">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1027">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1028">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1028">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1029">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1029">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1030">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1030">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1031">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1031">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1032">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1032">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1033">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1033">localhost</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1037">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1037">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1038">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1038">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1039">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1039">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1040">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1041">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1041">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1042">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1042">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1043">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1043">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1044">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1044">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1045">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1045">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1046">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1046">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1047">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1047">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1048">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1048">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1049">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1049">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1050">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1050">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1051">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1051">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1052">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1052">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1053">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1053">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1054">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1055">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1055">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1056">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1057">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1058">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1058">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1059">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1059">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1060">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1060">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1078">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1078">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1079">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1080">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1080">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1081">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1081">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1082">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1082">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1083">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1083">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1084">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1084">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1085">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1086">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1086">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1088">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1088">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1089">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1089">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1090">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1090">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1091">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1091">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1092">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1093">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1093">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1094">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1095">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1095">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1096">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1097">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1097">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1098">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1099">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1099">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1100">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1100">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1101">From `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1101">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1234">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1234">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1236">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1236">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1238">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1238">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1239">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1239">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1240">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1240">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1241">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1241">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1242">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1242">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1243">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1243">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1244">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1245">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1246">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1247">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1248">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1248">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1249">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1249">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1250">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1250">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1251">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1251">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1252">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1252">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1253">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1253">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1312">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1312">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1313">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1313">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1314">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1315">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1315">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1316">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1317">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1317">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1318">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1319">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1319">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1320">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1321">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1322">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1322">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1323">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1323">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1347">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1347">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1348">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1348">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1349">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1350">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1350">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1352">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1352">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1353">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1354">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1354">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1357">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1357">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1358">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1358">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1359">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1359">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1360">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1360">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1380">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1380">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1381">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1382">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1383">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1384">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1385">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1386">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1387">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1388">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1388">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1390">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1390">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1391">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1391">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1392">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1392">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1393">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1393">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1394">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1394">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1395">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1395">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1396">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1396">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1397">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1397">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1398">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1398">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1399">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1400">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1400">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1401">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1402">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1403">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1403">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1404">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1404">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1406">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1406">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1407">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1407">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1408">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1408">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1409">n º va</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1409">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1410">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1410">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1411">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1411">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1412">numéro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1412">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1413">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1413">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1414">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1414">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1416">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1416">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1417">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1417">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1418">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1418">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1419">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1420">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1420">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1421">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1422">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1422">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1423">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1423">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1424">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1424">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1425">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1425">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1426">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1426">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1427">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1427">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1428">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1428">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1429">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1429">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1430">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1430">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1431">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1431">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1432">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1433">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1436">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1436">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1437">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1437">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1438">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1438">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1439">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1440">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1440">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1441">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1441">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1443">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1443">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1444">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1444">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1446">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1446">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1447">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1447">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1448">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1448">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1449">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1449">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1450">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1450">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1451">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1451">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1452">고 eita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1452">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1453">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1453">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1454">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1455">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1455">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1456">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1457">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1457">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1458">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1458">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1459">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1459">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1460">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1461">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1461">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1462">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1462">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1463">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1463">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1464">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1464">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1465">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1465">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1466">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1466">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1467">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1467">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1468">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1468">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1469">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1469">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1470">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1470">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1471">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1471">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1472">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1472">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1473">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1473">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1474">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1475">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1475">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1476">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1476">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1498">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1498">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1499">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1500">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1500">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1501">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1501">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1502">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1503">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1503">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1504">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1504">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1505">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1505">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1506">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1507">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1507">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1508">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1509">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1509">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1510">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1510">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1511">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1511">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1512">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1512">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1513">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1513">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1514">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1514">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1515">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1516">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1519">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1519">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1520">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1520">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1521">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1523">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1523">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1524">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1526">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1526">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1527">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1527">Cédula de identidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1529">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1529">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1530">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1530">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1531">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1531">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1534">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1534">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1535">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1535">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1538">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1538">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1540">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1540">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1541">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1542">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1543">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1545">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1545">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1546">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1546">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1673">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1673">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1674">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1674">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1675">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1675">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1676">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1676">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1677">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1677">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1678">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1678">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1679">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1679">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1680">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1681">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1681">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1682">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1683">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1683">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1684">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1684">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1685">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1685">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1686">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1686">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1687">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1687">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1688">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1689">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1689">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1690">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1691">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1691">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1692">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1692">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1693">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1693">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1694">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1694">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1695">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1695">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1740">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1740">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1741">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1741">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1742">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1743">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1743">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1744">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1745">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1745">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1746">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1747">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1747">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1748">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1749">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1749">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1750">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1750">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1751">From  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1751">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
