- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1765">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1765">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1766">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1766">номер на паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1767">паспорт 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1767">паспорт №</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1768">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1768">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1769">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1770">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1770">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1771">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1772">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1772">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1773">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1773">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1774">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1774">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1775">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1775">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1776">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1776">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1777">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1777">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1778">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1778">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1779">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1780">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1780">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1781">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1782">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1783">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1783">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1784">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1784">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1785">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1785">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1786">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1787">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1787">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1788">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1788">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1789">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1789">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1812">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1812">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1813">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1814">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1814">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1815">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1815">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1816">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1816">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1817">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1818">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1820">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1820">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1821">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1821">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1822">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1822">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1823">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1823">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1959">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1959">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1960">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1961">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1961">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1962">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1963">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1963">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1964">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1965">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1966">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1967">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1967">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1968">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1968">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1969">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1969">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1970">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1970">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1972">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1972">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1974">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1974">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1975">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1975">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1976">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1976">automobile accident</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1981">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1981">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1983">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1983">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1985">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1985">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1987">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1987">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-1988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-1989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1990">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1990">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-1991">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-1991">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2025">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2025">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2026">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2027">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2027">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2028">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2029">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2030">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2030">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2031">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2031">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2064">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2064">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2065">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2066">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2066">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2067">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2068">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2068">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2069">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2069">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2070">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2070">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2071">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2071">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2072">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2072">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2073">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2073">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2074">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2074">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2075">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2076">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2076">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2077">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2078">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2079">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2079">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2080">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2080">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2081">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2081">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2082">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2082">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2083">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2083">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2084">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2084">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2085">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2086">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2086">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2087">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2087">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2088">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2088">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2113">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2113">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2115">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2115">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2117">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2117">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2118">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2118">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2119">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2119">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2120">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2120">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2121">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2121">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2122">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2122">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2123">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2123">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2124">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2124">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2125">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2126">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2126">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2127">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2128">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2129">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2129">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2130">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2130">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2131">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2132">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2132">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2133">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2133">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2134">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">

     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2149">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2149">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2151">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2151">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2153">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2153">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2154">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2154">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2155">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2155">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2156">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2156">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2157">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2157">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2158">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2161">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2162">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2162">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2163">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2163">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2164">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2165">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2166">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2166">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2167">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2175">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2175">居民身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2180">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2180">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2181">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2182">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2182">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2183">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2184">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2184">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2186">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2186">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2189">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2189">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2190">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2190">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2191">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2191">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2192">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2192">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2193">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2193">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2194">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2194">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2195">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2196">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2196">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2197">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2197">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2457">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2457">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2458">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2458">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2459">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2460">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2460">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2461">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2462">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2462">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2463">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2464">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2467">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2467">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2468">From `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2468">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2592">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2592">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2593">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2593">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2595">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2595">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2596">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2596">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2597">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2597">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2598">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2599">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2599">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2600">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2601">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2602">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2602">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2603">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2603">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2634">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2634">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2635">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2635">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2636">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2637">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2637">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2638">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2639">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2639">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2640">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2641">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2641">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2642">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2643">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2644">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2644">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2645">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2645">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2646">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2646">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2648">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2648">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2649">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2649">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2650">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2650">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2651">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2651">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2652">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2652">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2663">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2663">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2664">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2665">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2665">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2667">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2667">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2668">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2668">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2669">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2669">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2674">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2674">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2675">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2675">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2676">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2678">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2678">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2679">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2710">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2710">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2711">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2711">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2712">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2713">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2713">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2715">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2715">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2716">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2716">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2717">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2717">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2718">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2719">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2719">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2720">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2721">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2721">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2722">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2722">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2723">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2723">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2724">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2724">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2725">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2725">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2742">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2742">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2743">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2745">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2745">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2747">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2747">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2748">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2749">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2751">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2752">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2752">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2753">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2878">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2878">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2879">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2879">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2880">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2880">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2881">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2881">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2882">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2882">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2883">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2883">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2884">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2884">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2885">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2886">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2886">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2887">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2888">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2888">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2889">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2890">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2890">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2891">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2892">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2893">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2893">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2894">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2894">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2895">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2895">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2899">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2899">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2900">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2900">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2901">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2901">personal id number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2903">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2903">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2904">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2904">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2905">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2906">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2906">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2908">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2908">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2909">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2910">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2913">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2913">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2914">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2940">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2940">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2941">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2941">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2942">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2942">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2943">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2943">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2944">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2944">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2945">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2945">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2946">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2946">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2947">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2948">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2948">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2949">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2950">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2950">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2951">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2951">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2952">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2952">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2953">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2953">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2954">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2955">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2955">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2957">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2957">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2958">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2958">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2959">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2959">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2960">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2961">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2961">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2989">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2989">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2990">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2990">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2991">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2992">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2992">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2993">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-2994">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2994">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2995">' E ' 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2995">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2996">a 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2996">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2997">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2997">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-2998">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2998">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-2999">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-2999">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3000">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3000">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3001">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3001">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3002">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3002">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3003">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3003">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3004">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3004">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3130">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3130">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3131">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3133">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3133">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3135">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3135">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3136">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3137">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3137">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3140">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3140">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3141">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3141">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3160">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3160">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3161">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3162">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3162">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3163">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3164">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3164">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3165">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3165">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3166">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3166">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3167">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3167">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3168">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3168">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3169">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3169">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3170">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3170">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3171">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3171">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3173">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3176">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3176">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3177">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3177">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3178">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3178">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3179">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3180">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3180">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3181">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```
