## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3228">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3228">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3229">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3229">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3230">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3231">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3231">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3232">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3232">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3233">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3233">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3234">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3234">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3235">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3235">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3236">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3236">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3237">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3237">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3238">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3238">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3239">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3239">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3240">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3240">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3241">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3241">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3242">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3242">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3243">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3243">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3244">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3244">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3245">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3245">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3261">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3261">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3262">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3263">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3264">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3264">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3266">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3266">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3267">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3268">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3268">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3269">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3270">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3271">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3271">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3272">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3272">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3396">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3396">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3397">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3399">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3399">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3401">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3401">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3402">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3403">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3403">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3404">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3406">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3406">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3407">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3407">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3424">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3424">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3426">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3426">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3428">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3428">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3429">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3429">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3430">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3430">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3431">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3431">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3432">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3433">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3435">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3436">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3436">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3437">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3437">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3438">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3438">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3439">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3439">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3440">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3440">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3441">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3441">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3503">personnr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3503">personnr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3504">personregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3504">personregister</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3505">sygesikringsbevis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3505">sygesikringsbevis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3506">sygesikringsbevisnr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3506">sygesikringsbevisnr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3507">sygesikringsbevisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3507">sygesikringsbevisnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3511">sygesikringsnr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3511">sygesikringsnr</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3513">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3513">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3514">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3514">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3515">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3516">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3516">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3517">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3518">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3518">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3519">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3519">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3520">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3520">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3521">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3521">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3522">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3523">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3523">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3525">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3525">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3526">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3526">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3527">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3527">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3528">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3529">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3529">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3530">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3530">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3531">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3531">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3532">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3532">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3533">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3533">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3534">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3534">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3535">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3535">nationalnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3539">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3539">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3540">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3540">personalidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3542">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3542">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3543">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3543">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3544">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3544">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3545">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3545">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3546">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3546">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3547">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3547">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3548">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3548">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3549">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의의 성 또는 숫자 ' 9 '의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3549">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3550">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3550">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3551">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3552">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3555">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3555">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3556">From 키워드를 `Keyword_dea_number` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3556">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3557">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3557">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3558">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3558">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3559">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3559">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3560">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3560">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3561">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3561">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3562">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3562">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3563">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3563">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3564">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3564">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3565">마약 적용 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3565">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3566">마약 적용 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3566">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3567">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3567">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3568">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3568">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3569">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3570">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3570">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3571">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3572">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3572">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3573">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3573">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3574">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3574">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3575">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3576">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3576">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3577">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3578">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3578">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3579">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3579">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3580">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3580">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3581">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3581">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3582">Keywords_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3582">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3585">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3585">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3586">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3586">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3587">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3587">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3588">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3588">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3589">드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3589">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3590">드라이버 driver'lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3590">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3591">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3591">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3592">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3592">driver licenses</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3706">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3706">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3707">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3707">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3708">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3708">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3709">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3709">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3710">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3710">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3711">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3711">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3712">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3712">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3713">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3714">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3714">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3715">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3716">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3716">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3717">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3717">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3718">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3718">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3719">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3719">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3720">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3720">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3721">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3722">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3722">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3723">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3724">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3724">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3725">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3725">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3726">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3726">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3727">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3727">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3728">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3728">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3761">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3761">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3762">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3764">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3764">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3766">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3766">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3767">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3768">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3771">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3771">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3772">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3772">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3773">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3773">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3775">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3775">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3776">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3776">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3777">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3777">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3778">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3778">passports</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3786">eesti kodaniku pass si 번호 passinumbrid 문서 번호 문서에 dokumendi veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3786">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3787">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3787">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3788">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3789">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3789">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3791">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3791">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3792">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3793">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3793">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-3795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3796">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3796">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3797">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3797">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3798">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3798">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3799">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3799">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3800">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3800">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3801">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3801">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3802">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3802">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3803">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3803">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3804">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3804">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_eu_debit_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3805">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3805">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_card_terms_dict"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-3811">Keyword_card_terms_dict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3811">Keyword_card_terms_dict</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-3812">acct nbr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-3812">acct nbr</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4249">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4249">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4250">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4251">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4252">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4252">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4253">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4254">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4254">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4255">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4255">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4256">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4256">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4257">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4257">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4258">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4258">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4259">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4260">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4260">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4262">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4263">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4263">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4264">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4264">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4395">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4395">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4396">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4396">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4397">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4397">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4398">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4398">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4399">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4399">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4400">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4400">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4401">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4401">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4402">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4403">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4403">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4405">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4405">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4406">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4406">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4407">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4407">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4408">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4408">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4409">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4410">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4410">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4411">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4412">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4412">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4413">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4413">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4414">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4414">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4432">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4432">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4433">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4434">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4434">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4435">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4436">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4436">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4437">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4437">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4438">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4438">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4439">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4439">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4440">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4440">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4441">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4442">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4442">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4444">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4445">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4445">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4446">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4446">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4447">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4447">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4448">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4448">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4449">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4449">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4450">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4450">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4499">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4499">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4500">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4500">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4501">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4501">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4502">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4502">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4503">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4503">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4504">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4504">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4505">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4505">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4506">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4506">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4507">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4508">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4510">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4510">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4511">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4511">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4512">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 또는 Keyword_finland_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4512">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4525">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4525">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4533">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4533">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4534">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4534">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4535">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4536">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4536">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4538">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4538">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4539">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4539">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4540">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4540">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4541">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4541">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4542">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4542">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4543">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4543">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4544">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4544">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4545">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4545">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4546">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4547">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4547">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4548">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4549">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4549">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4550">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4550">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4551">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4551">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4553">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4553">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4577">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4577">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4578">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4578">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4579">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4579">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4580">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4581">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4581">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4582">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4582">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4583">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4584">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4584">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4585">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4587">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4587">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4588">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4588">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4715">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4715">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4716">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4716">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4717">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4717">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4718">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4718">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4719">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4719">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4720">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4720">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4721">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4721">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4722">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4723">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4723">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4725">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4725">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4726">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4726">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4727">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4727">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4728">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4728">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4729">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4729">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4730">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4730">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4731">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4732">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4733">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4734">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4735">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4735">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4736">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4736">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4737">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4738">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4738">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4739">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4739">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4740">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4740">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4741">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4741">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4742">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4742">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4743">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4744">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4744">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4745">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4746">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4746">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4747">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4748">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4748">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4749">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4750">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4750">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4751">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4751">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4752">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4752">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4753">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4753">Keywords</span></span>
