- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4763">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4763">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4764">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4764">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4765">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4765">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4766">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4766">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4767">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4767">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4768">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4769">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4769">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4770">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4771">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4771">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4772">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4772">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4773">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4773">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4774">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4774">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4775">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4776">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4776">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4777">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4778">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4778">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4779">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4779">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4780">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4780">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4781">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4781">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4782">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4782">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4783">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4783">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4784">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4784">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4785">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4785">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4786">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4786">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4787">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4787">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4788">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4788">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4789">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4789">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4790">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4790">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4791">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4791">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4792">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4792">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4793">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4793">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4794">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4794">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4795">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4795">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4796">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4796">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4797">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4797">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4798">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4798">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4799">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4799">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4800">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4800">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4801">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4801">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4802">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4802">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4803">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4804">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4804">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4805">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4805">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4806">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4806">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4807">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4807">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4808">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4808">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4809">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4809">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4810">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4811">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4813">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4814">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4814">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4815">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4815">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4816">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4816">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4817">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4818">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4818">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4819">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4819">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4820">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4820">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4821">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4821">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4822">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4822">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4823">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4823">insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4825">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4825">securite sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4826">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4826">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4827">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4827">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4828">numéro d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4828">numéro d'identité</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4832">numero d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4832">numero d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4833">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4833">no d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4834">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4834">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4835">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4835">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4836">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4836">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4837">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4837">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4838">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4838">social insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4839">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4839">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4845">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4845">code sécu</span></span> 

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4846">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4846">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4847">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4848">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4848">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4850">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4850">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4851">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4851">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4852">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4852">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4853">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4853">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4854">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4854">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4855">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4855">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4856">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4856">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4857">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4857">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4858">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4858">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4859">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4859">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4860">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4860">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4861">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4861">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4862">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4862">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4863">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4863">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4864">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4864">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4865">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4865">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4866">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4866">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4867">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4867">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4868">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4868">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4888">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4888">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4889">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4890">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4891">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4892">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4893">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4894">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4895">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4896">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4896">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4898">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4898">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4899">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4899">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4900">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4900">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4901">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4901">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4902">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4902">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4903">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4903">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4904">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4904">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4905">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4905">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4906">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4906">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4907">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4907">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4908">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4908">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4909">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4909">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4910">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4910">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4911">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4911">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4912">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4912">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4913">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4913">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4914">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4915">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4915">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4916">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4916">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4917">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4917">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4918">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4918">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4920">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4920">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4921">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4921">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4922">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4922">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4923">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4923">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4925">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4925">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4926">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4926">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4927">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4927">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4928">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4928">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4929">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4929">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4930">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4931">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4931">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4933">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4933">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4934">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4934">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4935">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4935">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4936">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4936">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4937">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4937">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4938">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4938">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4939">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4940">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4940">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4941">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-4942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4943">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4943">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4944">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4944">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4945">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-4947">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4947">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-4948">ausstellungsdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-4948">ausstellungsdatum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5093">dlno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5093">dlno</span></span>


## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5094">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5094">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5095">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5096">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5096">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5097">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5097">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5098">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5099">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5099">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5100">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5100">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5101">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5101">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5102">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5102">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5103">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5103">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5104">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5105">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5106">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5107">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5108">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5108">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5109">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5109">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5110">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5110">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5111">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5111">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5112">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5112">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5113">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5113">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5114">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5114">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5115">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5115">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5116">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5116">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5117">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5117">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5118">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5118">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5119">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5119">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5120">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5120">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5121">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5121">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5122">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5122">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5123">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5123">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5124">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5124">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5125">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5125">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5126">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5126">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5127">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5128">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5128">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5129">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5130">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5130">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5131">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5131">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5132">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5132">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5133">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5133">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5134">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5134">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5135">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5135">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5136">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5136">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5137">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5137">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5138">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5138">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5139">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5139">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5140">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5140">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5141">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5141">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5143">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5143">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5144">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5144">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5145">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5145">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5146">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5146">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5147">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5147">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5148">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5148">reisepasse</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5150">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5150">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5151">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5151">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5152">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5152">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5153">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5153">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5154">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5154">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5155">포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5155">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5156">포트 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5156">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5157">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5157">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5158">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5159">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5159">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5160">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5160">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5161">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5161">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5162">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5162">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5163">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5163">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5164">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5164">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5165">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5165">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5166">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5166">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5167">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5167">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5168">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5168">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5169">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5169">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5170">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5171">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5171">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5172">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5173">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5173">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5174">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5174">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5175">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5175">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5176">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5177">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5177">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5178">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5178">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5179">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5179">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5180">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5180">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5181">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5181">steuer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5182">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5182">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5183">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5183">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5184">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5184">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5185">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5185">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5186">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5186">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5187">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5187">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5203">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5203">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5204">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5204">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5205">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5205">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5206">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5206">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5207">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5207">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5208">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5208">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5209">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5209">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5210">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5211">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5211">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5212">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5213">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5213">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5214">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5214">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5215">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5215">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5216">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5216">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5217">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5218">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5218">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5219">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5220">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5220">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5221">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5221">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5222">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5223">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5223">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5224">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5226">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5226">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5227">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5227">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5228">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5229">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5229">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5239">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5239">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5240">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5240">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5241">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5242">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5242">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5243">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5244">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5245">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5246">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5246">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5248">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5248">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5249">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5249">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5250">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5376">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5376">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5377">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5378">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5378">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5379">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5380">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5380">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5381">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5381">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5382">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5382">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5383">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5383">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5384">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5384">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5385">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5385">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5386">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5386">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5387">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5387">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5388">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5388">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5389">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5389">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5390">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5390">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5391">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5391">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5392">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5392">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5393">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5393">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5394">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5395">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5395">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5396">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5396">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5397">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5397">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5398">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5398">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5399">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5399">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5400">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5400">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5401">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5401">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5402">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5402">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5403">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5403">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5404">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5404">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5405">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5405">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5406">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5406">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5407">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5408">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5409">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5409">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5410">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5411">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5411">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5412">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5413">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5413">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5414">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5415">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5416">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5416">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5417">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5431">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5431">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5432">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5432">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5433">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5433">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5434">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5434">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5435">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5435">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5436">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5436">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5437">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5437">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5438">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5438">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5439">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5439">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5440">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5440">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5441">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5442">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5442">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5443">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5444">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5444">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5445">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5446">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5446">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5447">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5448">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5448">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5449">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5449">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5450">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5450">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5479">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5479">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5480">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5480">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5481">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5481">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5482">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5482">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5483">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5483">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5484">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5484">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5485">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5485">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5486">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5486">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5487">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5488">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5488">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5489">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5490">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5491">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5491">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5492">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5492">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5493">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5494">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5495">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5495">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5496">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5508">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5508">身份證</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5536">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5536">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5537">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5537">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5539">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5539">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5541">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5541">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5542">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5542">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5543">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5543">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5544">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5545">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5547">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5547">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5548">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5548">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5549">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5674">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5674">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5675">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5675">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5676">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5676">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5677">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5677">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5678">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5678">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5679">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5679">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5680">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5680">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5681">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5682">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5682">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5684">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5684">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5685">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5685">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5686">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5686">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5687">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5687">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5688">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5688">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5689">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5690">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5692">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5693">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5693">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5694">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5694">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5696">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5696">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5701">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5701">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5702">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5702">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5703">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5703">ig.</span></span>
