- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5706">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5706">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5707">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5707">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5708">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5708">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5709">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5710">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5710">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5711">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5712">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5712">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5714">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5716">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5717">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5717">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5718">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5719">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5719">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5721">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5721">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5722">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5722">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5723">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5723">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5724">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5724">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5725">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5725">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5726">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5726">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5727">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5727">passportnumber</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5735">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5735">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5736">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5736">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5737">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5738">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5738">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5740">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5740">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5741">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5742">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5742">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5744">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5745">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5745">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5746">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5746">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5747">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5748">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5748">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5768">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5768">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5769">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5769">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5770">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5770">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5771">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5771">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5772">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5772">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5773">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5773">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5774">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5774">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5776">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5776">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5778">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5778">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5779">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5779">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5780">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5780">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5781">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5781">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5782">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5783">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5783">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5784">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5785">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5785">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5786">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5786">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5787">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5787">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5788">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5788">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5789">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5789">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5815">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5815">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5816">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5817">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5818">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5819">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5820">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5821">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5822">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5823">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5823">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5824">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5825">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5825">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5826">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5826">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5827">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5827">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5828">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5828">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5829">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5830">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5831">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5832">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5833">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5833">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5834">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5834">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5835">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5835">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5836">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5836">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5841">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5841">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5842">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5842">vatno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5847">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5847">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5850">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5850">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5851">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5852">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5852">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5853">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5854">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5854">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5855">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5855">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5856">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (대/소문자 구분 안 함)의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5856">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5857">A 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5857">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5858">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5858">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5859">A 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5859">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5860">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5860">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5861">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5861">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5862">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5862">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5863">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5863">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5864">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5864">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5865">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5865">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5867">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5867">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5868">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5868">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5869">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5869">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5870">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5870">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5871">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5871">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5872">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5872">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5873">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5873">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5874">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5874">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5875">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5875">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5876">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5876">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5877">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5877">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5878">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5878">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5879">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5879">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5880">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5880">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5881">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5881">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5882">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5882">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5883">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5884">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5884">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5885">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5886">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5887">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5887">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5888">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5888">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5889">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5889">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5890">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5890">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5891">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5891">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5892">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5892">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5893">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5893">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5894">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5894">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5895">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5895">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5896">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5896">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5897">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5897">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5898">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5898">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5899">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5899">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5900">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5900">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5901">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5901">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5902">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5903">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5903">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5905">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5905">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5906">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5906">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5907">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5907">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5908">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5908">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5909">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5909">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5910">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5910">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5911">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5911">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5912">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5912">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5913">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5913">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5914">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5915">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5915">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5916">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5917">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5918">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5918">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5919">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5919">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5920">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5920">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5925">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5925">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5926">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5926">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5927">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5927">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5928">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5928">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5929">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5929">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5930">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5930">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5931">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5931">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5932">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5932">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5933">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5933">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5934">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5934">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5935">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5935">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5936">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5936">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5937">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5938">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5938">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5939">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5940">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5941">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5941">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5942">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5942">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5943">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5943">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5944">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5944">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5945">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5945">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5946">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5946">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5947">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5947">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5948">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5948">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5949">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5949">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5950">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5950">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5951">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5951">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5952">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5952">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5953">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5953">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5954">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5954">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5955">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5955">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5956">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5956">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5957">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5957">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5958">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5958">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5959">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5959">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5960">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5960">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5961">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5961">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5962">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5962">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5963">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5963">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5964">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5965">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5965">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5966">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5967">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5967">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5968">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5969">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5969">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5970">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5971">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5971">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5972">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5972">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5973">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5974">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5974">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5975">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5975">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5976">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5976">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5977">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5977">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5978">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5978">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5979">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5979">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5980">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5980">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5981">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5981">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5982">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5983">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5983">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5984">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5984">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5985">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5985">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5986">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5986">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5987">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5987">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5988">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5989">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5989">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-5990">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5991">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5991">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5992">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5992">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5993">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5993">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5994">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5994">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5995">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5995">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5996">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5996">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-5997">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5997">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5998">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5998">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-5999">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-5999">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6000">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6000">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6001">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6001">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6002">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6002">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6003">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6003">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6004">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6004">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6005">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6005">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6006">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6006">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6007">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6007">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6008">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6008">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6009">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6010">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6010">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6011">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6012">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6012">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6013">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6013">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6014">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6014">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6015">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6016">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6017">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6019">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6019">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6020">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6144">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6144">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6145">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6145">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6146">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6147">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6147">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6149">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6149">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6150">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6150">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6151">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6151">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6152">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6153">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6153">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6154">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6155">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6156">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6156">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6157">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6157">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6178">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6178">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6179">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6180">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6180">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6181">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6181">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6182">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6182">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6183">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6183">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6184">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6184">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6185">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6185">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6186">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6186">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6187">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6187">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6188">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6188">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6189">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6189">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6190">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6190">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6191">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6191">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6192">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6193">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6193">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6194">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6195">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6196">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6196">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6197">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6197">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6198">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6198">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6199">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6200">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6200">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6201">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6209">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6209">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6210">pps 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6210">pps no</span></span>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6246">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6246">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6247">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6248">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6248">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6249">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6250">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6250">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6251">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6251">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6252">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6252">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6253">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6253">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6254">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6254">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6255">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6255">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6256">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6256">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6257">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6257">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6258">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6259">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6259">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6260">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6261">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6261">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6262">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6262">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6263">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6263">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6264">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6264">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6265">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6265">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6266">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6266">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6267">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6267">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6268">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6268">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6269">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6269">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6270">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6270">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6271">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6272">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6272">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6274">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6274">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6275">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6276">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6279">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6279">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6280">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6280">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6281">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6287">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6287">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6288">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6288">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6289">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6289">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6291">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6291">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6292">idnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6292">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6293">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6293">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6294">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6294">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6295">identitynumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6295">identitynumber#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6300">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6300">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6301">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6301">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6302">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6303">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6303">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6305">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6305">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6306">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6306">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6307">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6307">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6308">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6309">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6309">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6310">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6311">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6311">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6312">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6313">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6314">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6314">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6315">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6315">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6316">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6317">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6317">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6318">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6318">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6319">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6319">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6320">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6320">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6321">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6321">patenti di guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6323">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6323">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6324">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6324">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6325">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6325">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6326">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6326">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6327">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6327">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6328">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6328">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6329">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6329">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6330">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6331">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6331">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6332">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6333">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6333">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6334">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6334">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6335">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6335">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6336">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6336">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6337">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6337">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6338">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6338">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6339">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6339">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6340">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6340">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6341">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6342">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6342">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6344">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6345">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6345">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6346">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6346">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6347">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6347">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6348">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6348">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
