## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6383">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6383">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6384">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6384">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6385">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6386">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6386">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6387">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6387">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6388">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6388">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6389">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6389">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6390">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6390">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6391">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6392">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6392">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6394">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6395">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6395">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6396">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6414">numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6414">numero di passaporto</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6416">포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6416">passeport italien</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6417">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6417">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6418">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6419">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6420">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6421">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6422">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6423">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6424">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6425">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6425">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6427">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6427">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6428">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6428">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6429">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6429">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6430">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6430">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6431">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6431">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6432">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6433">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6436">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6436">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6437">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6437">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6438">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6438">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6439">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6439">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6440">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6440">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6441">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6441">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6442">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6442">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6443">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6443">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6444">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6444">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6445">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6445">iva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6446">iva #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6446">iva#</span></span>


## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6447">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6447">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6448">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6449">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6449">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6450">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6451">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6451">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6452">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6452">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6453">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6453">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6454">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6454">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6455">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6455">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6456">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6456">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6457">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6458">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6461">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6461">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6462">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6462">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6463">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6463">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6464">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6464">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6465">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6465">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6467">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6467">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6468">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6468">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6515">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6515">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6516">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6517">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6517">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6518">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6519">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6519">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6520">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6521">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6523">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6524">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6524">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6525">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6525">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6564">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6564">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6565">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6565">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6567">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6567">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6568">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6568">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6569">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6569">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6570">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6570">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6571">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6571">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6572">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6572">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6573">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6573">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6574">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6574">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6575">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6575">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6576">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6577">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6577">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6578">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6579">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6579">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6580">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6580">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6581">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6581">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6582">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6582">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6583">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6583">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6610">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6610">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6611">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6611">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6612">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6618">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6618">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6632">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6632">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6633">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6634">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6634">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6635">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6636">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6636">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6637">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6638">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6639">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6640">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6640">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6641">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6641">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6642">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6642">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6643">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6643">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6644">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6644">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6645">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6645">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6646">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6646">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6647">Passport 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6647">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6648">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6648">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6649">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6649">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6650">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6650">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6651">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6651">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6652">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6652">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6653">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6653">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6654">パスポートNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6654">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6655">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6655">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6656">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6656">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6657">旅券番号 ♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6657">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6658">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6658">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6659">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6659">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6661">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6661">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6663">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6663">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6664">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6664">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6665">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6665">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6666">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6666">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6668">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6668">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6671">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6671">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6672">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6672">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6673">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6673">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6674">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6674">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6675">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6675">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6676">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6676">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6677">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6677">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6678">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6678">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6679">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6679">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6680">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6680">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6681">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6681">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6682">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6683">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6685">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6685">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6686">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6687">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6688">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6689">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6689">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6690">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6690">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6691">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6691">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6692">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6693">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6693">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6694">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6694">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6695">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6695">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6696">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6696">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6697">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6697">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6698">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6698">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6699">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6699">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6700">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6700">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6701">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6701">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6702">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6702">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6703">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6703">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6704">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6704">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6705">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6706">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6706">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6708">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6708">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6709">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6709">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6710">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6710">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6711">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6711">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6712">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6712">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6714">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6714">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6717">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6717">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6718">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6718">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6719">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6720">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6720">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6721">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6721">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6742">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6742">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6743">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6745">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6745">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6747">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6747">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6748">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6748">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6749">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6749">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6750">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6751">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6751">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6754">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6754">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6755">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6880">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6880">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6881">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6882">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6882">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6884">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6884">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6885">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6885">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6886">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6886">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6887">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6887">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6888">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6888">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6889">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6889">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6890">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6890">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6891">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6891">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6892">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6892">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6893">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6893">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6894">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6895">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6895">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6896">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6897">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6897">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6898">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6898">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6899">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6899">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6900">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6900">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6901">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6901">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6964">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6964">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6965">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6965">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6966">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6967">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6967">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6968">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6968">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6969">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6969">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6970">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6970">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6971">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6971">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6972">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6973">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6973">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6974">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6975">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6976">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6976">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-6977">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6977">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6997">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6997">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-6998">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6998">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-6999">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-6999">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7000">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7000">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7001">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7001">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7002">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7002">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7003">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7003">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7004">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7004">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7005">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7005">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7006">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7006">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7007">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7007">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7008">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7008">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7133">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7133">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7134">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7134">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7135">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7135">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7136">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7136">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7137">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7137">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7138">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7138">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7139">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7139">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7140">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7141">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7141">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7142">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7143">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7143">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7144">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7144">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7145">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7145">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7146">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7146">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7147">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7147">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7148">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7148">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7149">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7149">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7150">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7150">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7151">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7151">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7152">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7152">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7153">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7153">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7154">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7155">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7155">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7190">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7190">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7191">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7192">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7193">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7193">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7195">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7195">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7196">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7197">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7197">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7198">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7200">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7200">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7201">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7201">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7218">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7218">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7219">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7219">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7220">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7221">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7221">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7222">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7223">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7223">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7224">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7225">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7225">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7227">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7228">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7228">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7229">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7229">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7353">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7353">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7354">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7354">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7355">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7355">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7356">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7356">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7357">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7357">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7358">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7358">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7359">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7359">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7360">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7360">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7361">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7361">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7362">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7362">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7363">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7363">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7364">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7364">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7365">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7365">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7366">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7367">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7367">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7368">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7369">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7369">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7370">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7370">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7371">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7371">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7372">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7373">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7373">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7396">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7396">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7397">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7399">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7399">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7401">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7401">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7402">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7403">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7403">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7404">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7405">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7406">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7406">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7407">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7407">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7408">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7408">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7409">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7409">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7410">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7410">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7411">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7411">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7412">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7412">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7413">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7413">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7414">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7414">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7415">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7416">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7416">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7418">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7418">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7419">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7419">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7420">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7420">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7421">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7421">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7422">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7422">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7423">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7423">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7424">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7424">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7425">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7425">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7426">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7426">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7427">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7428">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7428">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7429">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7430">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7430">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7431">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7431">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7432">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7432">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7433">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7433">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7434">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7434">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7474">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7474">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7475">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7476">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7476">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7478">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7478">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7479">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7479">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7480">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7480">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7481">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7481">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7482">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7482">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7483">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7483">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7484">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7484">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7485">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7486">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7486">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7489">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7489">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7490">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7490">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7491">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7491">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7492">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7492">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7493">디지털 응용 프로그램 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7493">digital application card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7494">i/c</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7494">i/c</span></span>
