## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7517">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7517">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7518">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7519">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7520">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7520">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7521">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7522">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7522">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7523">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7523">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7524">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7524">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7525">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7525">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7526">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7526">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7527">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7527">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7528">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7529">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7530">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7531">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7531">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7532">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7532">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7533">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7657">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7657">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7658">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7658">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7659">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7659">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7660">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7660">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7661">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7661">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7662">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7662">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7663">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7663">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7664">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7665">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7665">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7667">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7667">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7668">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7668">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7669">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7669">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7671">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7671">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7673">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7674">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7674">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7675">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7675">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7676">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7677">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7677">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7694">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7694">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7695">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7695">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7696">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7697">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7697">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7698">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7699">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7699">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7700">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7700">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7701">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7701">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7702">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7702">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7703">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7704">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7704">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7705">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7705">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7722">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7722">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7723">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7724">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7724">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7725">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7725">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7726">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7726">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7727">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7727">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7728">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7729">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7729">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7730">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7730">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7731">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7731">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7732">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7732">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7733">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7733">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7734">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7735">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7735">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7737">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7737">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7738">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7738">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7739">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7739">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7740">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7740">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7741">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7741">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7774">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7774">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7776">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7776">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7778">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7778">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7779">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7779">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7780">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7780">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7781">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7781">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7782">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7782">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7783">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7783">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7784">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7785">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7785">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7786">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7787">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7788">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7788">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7789">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7789">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7790">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7790">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7800">사용자 관련 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7800">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7801">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7801">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7804">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7804">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7805">사회 aal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7805">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7806">사회적-회계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7806">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7807">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7807">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7808">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7808">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7809">identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7809">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7810">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7810">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7811">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7811">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7812">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7812">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7813">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7813">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7814">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7814">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7815">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7815">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7816">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7817">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7817">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7819">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7819">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7820">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7821">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7821">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7822">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7823">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7823">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7824">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7824">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7825">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7953">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7953">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7954">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7954">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7955">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7955">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7956">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7956">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7957">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7957">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7958">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7958">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7959">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7960">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7960">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7962">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7963">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7963">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7964">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7964">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7965">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7965">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7968">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7968">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7969">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7969">netherlands passport number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7974">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7974">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7975">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7976">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7977">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7978">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7979">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7980">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7981">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7982">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7982">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7983">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7984">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7984">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7985">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7986">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7986">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-7987">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7988">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7988">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7989">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7989">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7990">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-7991">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7991">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-7992">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-7992">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8030">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8030">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8031">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8031">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8032">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8032">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8033">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8033">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8034">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8034">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8035">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8035">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8036">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8036">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8037">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8038">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8038">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8039">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8040">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8040">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8041">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8041">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8042">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8042">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8043">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8043">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8044">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8044">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8045">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8045">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8046">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8046">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8047">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8047">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8048">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8049">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8050">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8051">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8051">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8052">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8052">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8053">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8053">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8054">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8054">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8055">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8055">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8064">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8064">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8065">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8065">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8066">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8066">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8067">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8067">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8068">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8068">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8069">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8069">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8070">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8070">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8071">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8072">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8072">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8073">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8074">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8074">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8075">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8075">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8076">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8076">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8077">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8077">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8078">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8078">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8079">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8079">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8080">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8080">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8081">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8081">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8082">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8082">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8083">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8084">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8085">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8086">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8086">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8087">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8087">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8088">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8088">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8089">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8089">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8090">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8090">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8098">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8098">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8099">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8099">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8100">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8100">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8101">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8101">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8102">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8102">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8103">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8103">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8104">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8104">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8105">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8106">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8106">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8107">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8108">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8108">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8109">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8109">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8110">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8110">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8111">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8112">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8114">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8114">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8115">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8115">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8116">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8116">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8117">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8117">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8118">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8118">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8185">뉴질랜드 inland 수입 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8185">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8186">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8186">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8187">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8187">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8188">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8188">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8189">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8189">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8190">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8190">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8191">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8191">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8192">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8193">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8193">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8195">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8195">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8196">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8196">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8197">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8197">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8198">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8199">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8199">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8200">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8201">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8204">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8204">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8205">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8205">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8206">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8206">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8207">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8207">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8208">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8208">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8209">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8209">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8213">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8213">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8214">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8214">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8215">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8215">ird number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8217">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8217">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8218">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8219">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8219">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8220">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8221">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8221">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8222">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8223">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8223">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8224">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8226">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8226">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8227">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8227">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8228">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8228">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8229">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8229">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8233">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8233">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8234">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8234">treatment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8236">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8236">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8237">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8237">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8238">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8238">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8239">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8239">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8240">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8240">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8241">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8241">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8242">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8243">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8243">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8244">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8245">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8245">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8246">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8246">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8247">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8247">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8248">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8248">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8249">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8249">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8250">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8250">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8251">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8252">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8252">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8253">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8254">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8254">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8255">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8255">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8256">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8256">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8257">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8257">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8258">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8258">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8259">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8259">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8260">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8260">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8261">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8261">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8262">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8262">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8263">소셜 welfare No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8263">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8264">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8264">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8265">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8265">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8266">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8266">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8267">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8268">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8268">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8270">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8270">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8271">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8271">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8272">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8272">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8273">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8273">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8274">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8275">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8275">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8278">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8278">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8279">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8279">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8280">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8280">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8281">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8282">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8282">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8283">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8292">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8292">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8293">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8294">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8294">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8295">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8296">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8296">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8297">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8297">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8298">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8298">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8299">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8299">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8300">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8300">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8301">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8301">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8302">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8302">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8303">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8303">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8304">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8304">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8305">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8305">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8306">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8306">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8307">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8307">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8308">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8308">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8309">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8309">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8310">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8310">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8311">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8311">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8312">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8312">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8313">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8313">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8314">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8314">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8315">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8316">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8317">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8317">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8318">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8319">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8319">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8320">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8320">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8321">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8321">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8322">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8322">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8323">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8324">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8324">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8325">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8325">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8326">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8326">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8327">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8327">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8328">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8329">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8329">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8330">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8330">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8341">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8341">driver license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8344">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8344">driver licences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8345">driverslic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8345">driverslic</span></span>
