## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8454">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8454">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8455">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8456">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8456">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8458">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8458">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8459">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8460">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8462">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8463">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8463">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8464">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8464">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8465">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8466">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8466">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8467">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8467">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8468">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8468">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8469">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8469">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8470">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8470">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8471">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8471">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8472">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8472">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8473">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8473">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8474">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8474">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8475">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8475">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8476">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8476">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8477">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8478">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8478">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8479">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8480">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8480">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8481">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8481">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8482">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8482">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8483">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8484">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8484">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8485">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8486">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8486">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8487">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8487">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8488">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8488">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8489">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8489">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8490">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8491">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8491">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8492">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8492">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8493">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8493">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8494">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8494">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8495">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8495">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8496">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8496">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8497">niepowtarzalny u r i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8497">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8498">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8498">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8499">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8499">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8500">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8500">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8501">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8501">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8502">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8502">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8503">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8503">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8504">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8504">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8505">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8505">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8506">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8507">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8507">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8509">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8509">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8510">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8511">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8511">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8512">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8513">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8513">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8514">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8514">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8515">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8515">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8516">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8516">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8517">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8517">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8518">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8518">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8519">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8519">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8520">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8520">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8521">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8521">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8522">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8522">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8523">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8523">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8524">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8524">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8525">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8525">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8526">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8526">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8527">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8527">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8528">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8528">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8529">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8529">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8531">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8531">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8533">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8533">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8534">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8534">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8535">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8535">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8536">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8536">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8537">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8537">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8538">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8539">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8539">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8540">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8541">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8542">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8542">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8543">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8543">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8544">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8545">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8545">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8546">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8546">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8550">통계 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8550">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8551">통계적 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8551">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8554">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8554">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8555">회사 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8555">company id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8560">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8560">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8562">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8562">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8563">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8563">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8564">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8564">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8565">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8565">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8566">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8566">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8567">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8567">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8568">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8568">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8569">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8570">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8570">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8571">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8572">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8572">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8573">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8574">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8574">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8575">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8576">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8577">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8577">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8578">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8578">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8608">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8608">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8609">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8610">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8610">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8612">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8613">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8614">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8616">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8616">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8617">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8617">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8618">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8618">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8638">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8638">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8639">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8639">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8640">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8641">두 개의 패턴-다음에 특수 문자가 있는 5-8 자리 문자 두 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8641">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8642">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8643">패턴 1: 다음에 특수 문자를 포함 하는 5/6 문자 2 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8643">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8644">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8644">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8645">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8645">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8646">5 또는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8646">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8647">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8647">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8648">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8648">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8649">패턴 2:1 개 문자 다음에 특수 문자가 있는 6/8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8649">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8650">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8650">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8651">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8651">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8652">6 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8652">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8653">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8653">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8654">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8654">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8655">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8655">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8656">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8656">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8657">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8657">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8658">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8659">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8659">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8660">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8660">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8661">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8661">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8662">Keywords_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8662">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8663">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8663">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8664">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8664">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8665">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8665">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8666">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8666">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8667">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8667">driverlicence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8669">드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8669">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8670">드라이버 driver'lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8670">driver lics</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8792">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8792">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8793">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8793">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8794">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8795">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8797">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8798">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8799">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8800">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8801">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8804">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8805">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8829">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8829">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8830">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8830">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8831">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8831">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8832">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8832">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8833">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8833">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8834">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8834">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8835">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8835">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8836">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8836">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8837">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8837">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8838">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8839">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8839">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8840">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8841">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8842">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8842">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8843">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8843">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8844">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8845">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8845">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8870">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8870">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8871">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8872">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8873">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8873">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8875">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8875">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8876">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8876">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8877">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8877">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8878">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8879">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8879">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-8880">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-8881">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8882">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8882">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-8883">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-8883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9011">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9011">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9012">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9012">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9013">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9013">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9014">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9014">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9015">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9015">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9016">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9016">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9017">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9017">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9018">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9019">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9019">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9020">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9021">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9021">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9022">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9022">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9023">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9023">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9024">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9024">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9025">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9026">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9026">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9028">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9028">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9029">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9029">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9030">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9031">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9031">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9032">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9032">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9083">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9083">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9084">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9084">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9085">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9086">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9086">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9087">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9088">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9088">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9089">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9090">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9090">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9091">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9092">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9092">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9093">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9093">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9094">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9094">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9108">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9108">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9109">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9109">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9110">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9110">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9111">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9111">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9112">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9112">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9113">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9113">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9114">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9114">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9115">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9115">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9116">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9116">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9117">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9117">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9118">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9119">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9119">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9120">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9120">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9121">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9121">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9122">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9122">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9123">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9123">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9124">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9124">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9125">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9126">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9126">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9127">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9128">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9129">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9129">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9130">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9130">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9147">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9147">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9148">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9148">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9149">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9149">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9150">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9150">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9151">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9151">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9152">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9152">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9153">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9153">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9154">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9155">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9155">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9156">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9157">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9157">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9158">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9158">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9159">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9159">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9160">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9160">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9161">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9162">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9163">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9164">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9165">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9165">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9166">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9166">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9183">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9183">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9184">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9184">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9185">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9185">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9186">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9186">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9187">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9187">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9188">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9188">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9189">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9189">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9190">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9190">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9191">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9191">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9192">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9192">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9193">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9193">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9194">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9194">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9199">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9199">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9200">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9200">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9201">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9202">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9202">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9203">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9203">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9204">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9204">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9205">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9205">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9206">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9206">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9207">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9207">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9208">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9209">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9209">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9210">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9211">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9211">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9212">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9212">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9213">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9213">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9214">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9214">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9216">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9216">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9228">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9228">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9229">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9229">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9230">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9231">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9231">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9232">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9232">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9233">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9233">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9234">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9234">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9235">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9235">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9236">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9237">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9237">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9238">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9239">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9240">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9240">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9241">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9241">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9367">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9367">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9368">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9369">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9370">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9371">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9372">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9373">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9374">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9375">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9375">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9376">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9377">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9377">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9378">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9378">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9379">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9379">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9380">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9380">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9381">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9381">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9382">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9382">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9383">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9383">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9385">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9385">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9386">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9386">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9387">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9387">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9388">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9388">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9435">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9435">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9436">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9436">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9437">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9438">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9438">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9440">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9440">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9441">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9442">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9442">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9443">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9445">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9445">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9446">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9446">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9460">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9460">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9465">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9465">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9466">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9467">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9468">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9468">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9469">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9470">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9470">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9471">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9472">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9473">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9474">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9475">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9475">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9476">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9476">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
