## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9603">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9603">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9604">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9604">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9605">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9605">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9606">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9606">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9607">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9607">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9608">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9608">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9609">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9609">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9610">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9611">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9611">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9613">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9613">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9614">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9614">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9615">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9615">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9616">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9616">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9617">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9617">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9618">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9619">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9619">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9620">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9621">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9622">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9622">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9623">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9623">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9625">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9625">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9653">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9653">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9654">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9654">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9655">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9656">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9656">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9657">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9658">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9658">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9659">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9659">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9660">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9660">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9661">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9661">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9662">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9663">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9663">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9664">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9665">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9665">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9666">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9666">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9667">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9667">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9668">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9668">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9680">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9680">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9681">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9681">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9687">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9687">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9688">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9689">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9690">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9691">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9692">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9694">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9695">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9695">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9696">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9697">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9697">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9698">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9698">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9699">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9699">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9700">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9700">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9701">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9701">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9702">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9702">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9703">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9704">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9704">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9705">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9705">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9706">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9706">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9707">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9707">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9731">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9731">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9732">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9733">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9733">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9735">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9735">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9736">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9736">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9737">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9737">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9738">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9738">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9739">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9739">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9740">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9740">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9741">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9742">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9742">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9744">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9745">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9745">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9746">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9746">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9747">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9747">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9748">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9748">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9749">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9749">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9753">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9753">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9754">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9755">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9755">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9757">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9757">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9758">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9758">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9759">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9759">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9760">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9760">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9761">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9761">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9762">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9762">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9763">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9763">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9764">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9765">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9765">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9766">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9767">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9767">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9768">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9768">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9769">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9769">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9770">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9770">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9771">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9772">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9772">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9773">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9773">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9774">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9774">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9775">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9775">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9776">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9776">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9777">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9777">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9778">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9778">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9779">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9779">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9780">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9780">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9781">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9781">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9782">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9782">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9783">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9784">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9784">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9785">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9786">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9786">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9787">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9787">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9788">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9788">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9789">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9790">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9792">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9793">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9793">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9794">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9794">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9796">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9796">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9930">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9930">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9931">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9931">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9932">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9932">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9933">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9933">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9934">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9934">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9935">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9935">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9936">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9936">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9937">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9938">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9938">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9939">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9940">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9940">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9941">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9941">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9942">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9942">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9943">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9943">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9945">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9945">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9948">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9948">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9949">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9949">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9950">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9950">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9951">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9951">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9975">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9975">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9976">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9976">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9977">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9978">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9978">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9980">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9980">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9981">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9981">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9982">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9982">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9983">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9983">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9984">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9985">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9985">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9986">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-9987">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9987">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9988">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9988">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9989">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9989">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9990">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9990">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-9991">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9991">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9992">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9992">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9993">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9993">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9994">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9994">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-9995">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-9995">passports</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10015">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10015">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10016">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10016">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10017">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10018">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10018">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10019">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10020">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10020">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10021">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10021">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10022">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10022">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10023">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10023">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10024">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10024">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10025">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10025">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10026">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10027">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10027">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10028">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10029">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10029">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10030">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10030">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10031">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10031">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10032">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10032">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10033">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10033">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10034">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10034">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10035">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10035">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10036">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10036">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10037">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10037">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10038">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10038">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10039">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10039">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10040">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10040">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10041">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10041">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10042">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10042">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10043">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10043">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10044">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10044">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10045">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10045">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10046">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10046">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10047">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10047">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10048">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10048">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10049">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10049">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10050">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10050">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10051">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10051">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10052">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10052">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10053">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10053">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10054">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10054">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10055">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10055">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10056">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10056">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10057">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10057">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10058">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10058">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10059">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10059">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10060">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10060">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10061">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10061">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10062">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10062">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10063">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10064">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10064">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10065">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10066">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10066">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10067">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10067">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10068">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10068">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10070">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10070">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10101">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10101">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10102">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10102">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10103">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10103">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10104">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10104">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10105">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10105">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10106">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10106">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10107">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10107">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10108">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10108">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10109">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10109">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10110">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10110">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10111">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10111">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10112">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10113">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10113">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10114">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10115">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10115">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10116">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10116">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10117">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10117">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10118">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10118">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10119">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10119">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10120">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10120">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10121">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10121">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10122">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10122">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10123">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10123">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10124">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10124">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10125">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10125">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10126">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10126">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10127">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10127">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10128">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10128">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10129">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10129">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10130">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10130">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10131">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10131">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10132">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10132">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10133">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10133">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10134">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10134">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10135">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10135">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10147">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10147">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10148">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10148">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10149">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10150">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10150">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10151">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10152">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10152">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10153">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10153">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10154">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10154">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10155">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10155">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10160">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10160">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10161">From  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10294">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10294">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10295">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10296">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10296">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10297">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10298">10 또는 12 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10298">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10299">두 자리 숫자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10299">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10300">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10300">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10301">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+" (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10301">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10302">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10302">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10303">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10304">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10304">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10305">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10306">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10306">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10307">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10307">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10308">From 키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10308">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10309">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10309">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10310">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10310">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10311">이 함수는 해당 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10311">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10312">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10312">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10331">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10331">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10332">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10332">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10333">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10334">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10334">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10336">8 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10336">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10337">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10338">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10338">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10339">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10340">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10340">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10341">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10341">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10342">다음 중 하나가 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10342">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10343">Keyword_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10343">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10344">Keyword_sweden_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10344">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10375">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10375">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10376">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10376">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10377">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10378">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10378">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10379">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10380">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10380">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10381">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10381">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10382">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10382">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10383">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10383">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10384">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10384">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10385">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10385">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10386">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10389">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10390">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10390">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10391">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10391">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10392">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10393">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10393">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10409">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10409">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10410">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10410">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10411">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10411">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10412">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10412">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10413">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10413">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10414">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10414">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10415">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10415">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10416">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10417">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10417">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10418">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10419">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10419">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10420">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10420">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10421">더하기 기호 또는 빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10421">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10422">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10422">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10423">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10423">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10424">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10424">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10425">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10425">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10426">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10427">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10427">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10428">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10429">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10430">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10430">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10431">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10431">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10433">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10433">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10459">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10459">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10460">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10460">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10461">4 개 문자 다음에 5-31 자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10461">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10462">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10462">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10463">4 개의 문자와 5-31 자의 문자 또는 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10463">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10464">4 문자 은행 코드 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10464">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10465">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10465">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10466">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10466">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10467">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10467">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10468">1 ~ 3 개의 문자 또는 숫자 (BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10468">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10469">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10470">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10472">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10473">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10473">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10474">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10474">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
