## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10511">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10511">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10512">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10512">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10513">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10514">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10515">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10516">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10517">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10518">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10519">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10519">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10520">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10521">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10521">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10522">3 자리 숫자-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10522">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10523">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10523">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10524">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10524">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10525">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10525">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10526">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10526">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10527">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10527">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10528">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10528">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10529">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10530">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10532">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10533">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10533">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10534">Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10534">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10535">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10535">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10536">Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10536">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10557">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10557">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10558">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10559">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10559">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10560">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10561">1 개 문자 (영문)와 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10561">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10562">1 개 문자 (영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10562">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10563">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10563">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10564">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10564">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10566">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10566">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10568">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10569">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10569">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10570">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10570">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10571">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10571">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10573">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10573">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10574">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10574">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10575">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10576">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10576">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10578">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10578">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10579">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10579">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10580">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10580">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10581">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10581">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10582">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10582">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10583">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10583">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10584">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10584">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10585">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10585">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10586">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10586">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10587">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10587">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10588">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10588">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10589">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10589">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10590">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10590">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10591">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10591">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10592">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10592">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10593">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10593">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10594">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10594">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10595">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10595">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10596">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10596">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10597">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10597">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10598">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10598">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10599">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10599">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10600">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10600">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10601">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10602">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10602">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10603">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10604">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10605">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10605">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10606">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10606">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10608">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10608">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10609">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10609">ROC passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10611">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10611">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10612">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10612">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10613">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10613">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10614">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10614">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10615">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10615">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10616">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10616">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10617">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10617">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10618">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10619">10 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10619">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10620">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10621">10 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10621">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10622">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10622">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10623">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10623">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10624">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10625">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10628">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10628">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10629">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10629">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10634">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10634">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10635">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10635">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10636">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10636">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10637">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10637">ARC</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10643">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10643">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10644">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10645">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10645">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10647">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10647">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10648">첫 번째 숫자는 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10648">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10649">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10649">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10654">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10654">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10655">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10655">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10656">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10656">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10657">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10657">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10659">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10659">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10660">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10660">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10661">Id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10661">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10662">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10662">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10663">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10663">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10664">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10664">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10665">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10665">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10666">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10666">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10667">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10668">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10668">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10669">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10670">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10670">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10671">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10672">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10675">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10675">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10676">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10676">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10678">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10678">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10679">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10679">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10680">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10680">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10681">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10681">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10684">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10684">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10685">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10685">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10686">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10686">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10687">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10687">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10688">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10689">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10689">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10690">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10691">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10691">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10692">5 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10692">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10693">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10693">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10694">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10694">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10695">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10695">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10696">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10696">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10697">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10698">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10698">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10699">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10701">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10701">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10702">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10702">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10703">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10703">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10712">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10712">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10713">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10713">motorcycles</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10721">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10721">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10722">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10722">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10723">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10724">2 개의 문자와 1-4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10724">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10726">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10726">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10727">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10728">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10731">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10731">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10732">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10732">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10733">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10733">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10734">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10734">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10735">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10735">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10736">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10736">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10737">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10737">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10738">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10738">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10739">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10739">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10740">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10740">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10742">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10742">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10744">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10744">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10745">3 또는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10745">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10746">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10746">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10747">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10747">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10748">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10748">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10749">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10749">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10750">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10751">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10751">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10754">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10754">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10755">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10755">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10756">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10756">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10757">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10757">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10758">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10758">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10759">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10777">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10777">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10778">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10778">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10779">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10779">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10781">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 개 문자 또는 9 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10781">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10783">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10783">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10784">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10784">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10785">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10785">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10786">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10786">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10787">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10787">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10788">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10788">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10789">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10789">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10790">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10790">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10791">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10791">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10792">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10792">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10793">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10793">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10794">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10794">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10795">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10795">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10796">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10796">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10797">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10798">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10798">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10801">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10801">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10802">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10802">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10804">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10804">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10805">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10805">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10806">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10806">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10807">national insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10807">national insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10808">national insurance contributions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10808">national insurance contributions</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10809">protection act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10809">protection act</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10810">소유권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10810">insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10811">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10811">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10812">insurance application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10812">insurance application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10813">medical application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10813">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10814">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10814">social insurance</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10826">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10826">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10827">고유 Taxpayer 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10827">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10828">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10829">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10830">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10831">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10832">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10834">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10835">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10835">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10836">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10837">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10837">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10838">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10839">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10839">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10840">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10841">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10841">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10842">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10842">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10843">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10843">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10844">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10844">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10850">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10850">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10852">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10852">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10854">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10854">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10855">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10855">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10863">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10863">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10864">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10865">6-17 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10865">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10867">6-17 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10867">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10868">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10868">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10869">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10869">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10870">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10870">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10871">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10871">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10872">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10872">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10873">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10873">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10903">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10903">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10904">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10905">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10905">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10906">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10907">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10907">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10908">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10908">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10909">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10909">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10910">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10911">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10911">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-10912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10913">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10914">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10914">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10915">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10915">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10916">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10916">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-10917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10917">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10918">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10918">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10919">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10919">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10920">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10920">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-10921">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-10921">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />

</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11019">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11019">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11020">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11021">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11021">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11022">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11023">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11023">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11024">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11024">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11025">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11025">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11026">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11026">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11027">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11027">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11028">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11028">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11029">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11029">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11030">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11030">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11031">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11031">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11032">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11032">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11033">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11033">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11034">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11034">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11035">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11035">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11036">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11036">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11037">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11037">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11038">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11038">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11039">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11039">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11040">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11040">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11041">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11041">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11043">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11043">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11044">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11044">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11045">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11045">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11046">Func_formatted_itin 또는 Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11046">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11047">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11047">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11048">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11048">Keyword_itin</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11061">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11061">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11062">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11063">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11063">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11064">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11064">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11065">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11066">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11066">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11067">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11067">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11068">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11068">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11069">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11069">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11070">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11070">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11071">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11072">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11072">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11073">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11074">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11074">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11075">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11075">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11076">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11076">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11077">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11077">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11078">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11078">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11079">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11079">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11080">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11080">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11081">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11081">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11082">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11082">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11083">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11083">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11084">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11084">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11085">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11085">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11086">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11086">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11087">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11087">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11088">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11088">SSA Number</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11100">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11100">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11101">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11101">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11102">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11102">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11103">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11103">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11104">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11105">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11105">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11107">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11107">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11108">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11108">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11109">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11109">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11110">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11110">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11111">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11112">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11112">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11113">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11113">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11134">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11134">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11135">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11135">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11136">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11136">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11137">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11137">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11138">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11138">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11139">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11139">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11140">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11140">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11141">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11142">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11142">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11144">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11144">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11145">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11145">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11146">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11146">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11147">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11147">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11148">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11149">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11149">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11150">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11150">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11159">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11159">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11160">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11161">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11162">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11163">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11164">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11165">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11166">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11167">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11167">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11169">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11169">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11170">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11170">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11171">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11171">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11173">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="56b33-11174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="56b33-11175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11176">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11176">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="56b33-11177">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="56b33-11177">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
